title: FS: 1887 N172 Old Judge, Germany Long (SOLD)
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 N172 Old Judge, Germany Long (SOLD)
posts.post_content:
A nice raw OJ of Germany Long.  Good clear image.  Clean except for a small yellow stain to top and some soiling to edges.  No paper loss to back.

Asking SOLD! shipped by PP F/F.
